## RegisterSelf type

Represents an object that can register itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RegisterSelf<T extends Constructable> = {
    register(container: Container): Resolver<InstanceType<T>>;
    registerInRequestor: boolean;
};
```
